tagline.en: We are in Shenzhen, Shenzhen is Asia's Sillcon Valley, EOShenzhen are aspired to serve next one billion people.
tagline.zh: 我们在深圳（亚洲的硅谷），EOShenzhen致力于服务下一个十亿人。

introduce.en: To provide solid and stable physical server for one billion people in region Shenzhen , Pearl River Delta and Greater China
introduce.zh: 我们提供安全稳定的物理服务器，致力于服务包括深圳，珠江三角洲，和大中华地区的下一个十亿人
